author: Yair Lamb
title: The best place to get down
body:
The first step in every battle games must be the insertion. Jumping  of a plane with a lot of players, with the same goal you have in your mind that probably be rather daunting.The thing you should to know is balancing risk,

 bigger places or towns will income the better packed full weapons. only problem is landing in one of are towns is the warranty of a firefight when you arrive the ground. 90% of players soil in towns fair under the plane. is better to fly a little bit further out, delay appearance the safe zone for minutes at the start of the game will end up landing in an beneficial place.

author: Yaretzi Mayo
title: Do the vehicles deserve the risk?
body: It is an infinite pleasure and an excellent way to move as a team, but also a great gift for your position. Vehicles are excellent at Free of  Fire and have advantages such as being able to quickly navigate the map or cut other players in open terrain, but there are also some important negative aspects. Vehicles obviously limit their ability to deal immediately with the enemy, can be heard from far away and are an easy target if unconsciously directed to an enemy ambush.

author: Jensen Combs
title: Game Styles: what is best for you?
body:
It depends on the preferences of the players and veterans of the real battle, I am sure that you have found a style of play that suits you, however, I advise you to step back, your comfort zone and try some something new for all beginners to fight, here are some effective styles for which you should have an idea.
Guns burning
Everyone likes to scream. With inflamed weapons, you'll end up using fallen enemies, and it's a great tactic, especially if you're part of a group. Running against an enemy can be a great way to overwhelm you unexpectedly, if your group knows how to play better together. With this style of play, flanking is crucial, it is essential to get a good angle from your enemy to ensure victory. This may not be the best single-player game because you do not have a backup and it will be easier for enemy players to follow your moves.

author: Leonardo Payne
title: Elude and compromise
body:
This is for all heart snipers. If you see an enemy player in Free of Fire, stay close, stay out of sight and commit to the best possible opportunity, usually when you collect equipment. It is an excellent style of play for duets and solos. Minimize the risks for you while you get the Alive countdown one by one. The ideal is to commit to distance to be able to closely monitor nearby enemies. Working as a team will be easier because you can expand in several fields of vision. Single players should seek coverage and participate from inside / near the deck to reduce their visibility to those around them.
survivalist
A game style that is perfect for all beginners of the real battle genre. Avoid fights at all costs and persist until the end, only kill 1 person to win. Participating in a single enemy unit is always preferable to many fighters.
While this does not seem to be the most fun game style, it will certainly help you reach the last 5 finals and give you time to get used to the mechanics of the game. Once you have an idea of ​​how the game is played, start fighting and take part in some additional battles to win this crucial fighting experience. Remember that your reward at the end of each match is directly related to your performance in the match. As a result, more casualties, more loot!

author: Leonardo Payne
title: The best combinations of weapons.
body:
While some firearms seem to be guaranteed as players' killing machines, it's really great to play. For those looking for a close combat on the ground, a shotgun and an SMG combo / assault rifle can never fail. The devastating damage caused by a low caliber 12-gauge explosion will damage the armor and the health of the enemy. Combine it with a high SMG firing rate and you will accumulate losses, the main disadvantage of this association is the higher recharge rate of the shotgun. Give yourself time to recharge, seeking refuge after each commitment.

For those looking to eliminate other players from a distance, snipers and assault rifles are always winners. Our favorite personal combination and the best recommendation to reach the first place: a long-range sniper, such as SCAR or AK's kar98k, can really dominate a battle. Hitting players from all over the field will confuse them and cause panic if you do not eliminate them with some quick shots in the head.
Survivors may prefer to follow with an assault rifle and combined SMG, spray and prey that maybe are not the most elegant fighting style, but can be very effective.
If you play duo or group, spread the weapons. Variety is the salt of life and being able to adapt quickly will give you an advantage over others on the battlefield.

author: Armor levels and damage.
title: Why I Love Yellow
body:
Get an armor early and fast. Always check any piece of armor you see around there if you have not yet purchased level 3 items. Armor is the difference between winning and losing. An armored player with a level 3 assault rifle should not really be random, combine it with medical kits whenever he has the chance and almost certainly win against each one.
The armor is damaged over time, however, a level 3 with poor health protects a shot more damaging than the level 2 armor. Do not negotiate that when you reach the last 10-15% of sustainability, even in this case , the risk of exploring new sources of level 3 can be profitable.

author: Jensen Combs
title: Armor and boxes of supplies.
body: The game allows you to gain armor and boxes of supplies. The more you play and the higher your final position, the more cases you will receive. These boxes are an excellent initial benefit and can really help you survive until you equip yourself better. The supply kits are perfect for supplying ammunition or medical kits, but they can not compete with the armor cases. Use them as often as you have them! Armor cases give you a piece of armor at the beginning of a game at a random level. Yes, it means you can start with a level 3 armor!

author: Destiny Long
title: Learn to love the circle of death.
body: Believe it or not, the blue zone can go from your worst enemy to your best friend! It is an excellent way to play regardless of the size of your team. Play against the edge of the circle. If you are constantly moving your back to the circle, you know that you are safe in your 6. The circle may be the best forward. Limiting the directions in which enemies can attack you is perhaps the most useful technique you can find when you play Free of Fire or any Royal Battle game. Even if enemy players find themselves knitting in blue, you will have a superior advantage, because once they have healed, blue will end their health bar. I love the circle.

author: Destiny Long
title: Make the most of your bag.
body:
As silly as it sounds, filling your bag with everything you find is completely ridiculous. After playing a few rounds, you can count the number of shots you shot in one hand. Gun ammunition is okay if you have small amounts, but most of the time, you will spend all of your time without using your gun. This applies to all weapons that you have not yet equipped.
The ammunition is abundant, you can find it in the bodies, in the buildings or in your ammunition boxes at the beginning of the game. You can also apply this principle to the grenades. The number of times you die trying to kill this impressive grenade is not worth it. The first aid kits and ammunition are their main priority, more murders and more care. Use it or lose it, it is always good to take it into account.

author: Destiny Long
title: The old shots and movements.
body: If you look at the best YouTube users in the Battle Royale series, you will notice a unique feature: they shoot and move. Spending time in one place is asking for certain death. It will only be a matter of time before a larger team or more experienced players re-start your position. In combat, changing positions permanently will disorient your enemy and he will not know where you will appear, which will prevent him from focusing on head shots.

author: Destiny Long
title: Classified battles
body: The classified battles are meant to show how much you dominate the arena. This is where you will meet all the experienced players. All that matters here is victory, how to climb to the top of the leaderboard and test your metal.

author: Destiny Long
title: Your mini map is your best weapon.
body:
It will help you more than you can imagine. Each time an enemy fires nearby, it appears temporarily on your mini-map as a red flip but also as a directional arrow. This will give you the opportunity to use the element of surprise and get the jump on the other player. Just be prepared to eliminate the goal you were looking for is that they do not finish the job.
Following the tips and tricks of Free of Fire mentioned above should place you in a good place for your first battles or encourage existing players to try new styles. Good luck and remember, to make the most of every fight, it is not only victory, but travel. I'm sure you'll have more chicken dinners than you ever imagined!
